Text: god I hate top gear US, its criminally stupid compared to the brits
this show does NOT deserve the Top Gear badge...leave it to BBC please!

I don't think we are going to have much choice in the matter, I've heard rumors of passing the top gear torch to the US one (which is extremely sad), but Jezzer and Capt. slow are getting old.  Even if they keep the UK one and replace the old presenters it still won't be the same.  It's hard to replace that kind of chemistry
